# API Surface: core

*Auto-generated by Intelligent Analyzer*

| Name | Type | Description | Location |
|------|------|-------------|----------|
| CLI Commands | CLI | Commander.js-based CLI with 50+ commands for increment lifecycle, sync, validation, and workflow management | src/cli/commands/ |
| GitHub Integration | REST API | Octokit-based GitHub API client for issues, projects, and repository operations | plugins/specweave-github/lib/github-client-v2.ts |
| JIRA Integration | REST API | JIRA REST API v3 client with JQL filtering, sprint management, and MCP server fallback | src/integrations/jira/jira-client.ts |
| Azure DevOps Integration | REST API | ADO REST API client for work items, iterations, and area paths with PAT authentication | src/integrations/ado/ado-client.ts |
| LLM Provider API | Internal API | Unified interface for Anthropic, OpenAI, Azure OpenAI, Bedrock, Ollama, and Vertex AI | src/core/llm/index.ts |
| Sync Coordinator | Internal API | High-level sync orchestration for living docs and external tool synchronization | src/sync/sync-coordinator.ts |
